title: Adolescent maternal health services utilization and associated barriers in Sub-Saharan Africa: A comprehensive systematic review and meta-analysis before and during the sustainable development goals
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Tadesse Tolossa, Lisa Gold, Merga Dheresa, Ebisa Turi, Yordanos Gizachew Yeshitila, Julie Abimanyi-Ochom
